[[Image:Silver medal icon.svg]] [[1973 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1973]], [[1983 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1983]], [[1985 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1985]], [[1993 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1993]], [[1995 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1995]], [[2007 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2007]]
[[Image:Bronze medal icon.svg]] [[1979 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1979]], [[1991 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1991]], [[2001 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2001]], [[2005 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2005]], [[2011 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2011]] |h_pattern_b=_thinsidesonwhite|h_body=DD0000|h_shorts=DD0000|h_pattern_s=_blanksides2 |a_pattern_b=_thinyellowsides|a_body=DD0000|a_shorts=DD0000|a_pattern_s=_yellowsides }} The '''Spain national U-16 basketball team''' ''(Spain Kids national basketball team)'', is the representative for [[Spain]] in international [[basketball]] competitions, and it is organized and run by the [[Spanish Basketball Federation]]. The '''Spain national U-16 basketball team''' represents Spain at the [[FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship]]. ==FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |-
